Job Description: What you will be doing:     Working in a fast-paced environment, designing and implementing new features to our core product quickly    Designing scalable solutions to handle our ever increasing user base    Working with a wide range of systems, processes, and technologies to own and solve problems from end-to-end    Building new features for internal and external users    Learning new technologies quickly    Managing a team, mentor, guide coach the team   What we would like you to have:    1-3 years experience with high quality backend and/or frontend code to a production environment    Solid knowledge of Java, NodeJS, JavaScript (.Net would be great add on)    Experience with Spring application framework    Experience with SQL data stores (we use PostgreSQL)    Experience with ReactJS user interface library    Experience working with APIs and integrating with cloud services    Disciplined approach to testing and quality assurance    Lead and mentored a team     BS or MS in Computer Science, Computer/Electrical Engineering or equivalent work experience   Bonus points for:    Experience with Docker and Kubernetes    What we can offer you:    Challenging work with leading edge technology     Career growth     Benefits - Equity, Medical, PF
